did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Executive Office: Association Files of Governor James S. Gilmore, 1998-2001

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Executive Office: Association Files for Governor James S. Gilmore, 1998-2001. Accession 40175. State government records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Va. 23219.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Transferred from James S. Gilmore, 17 November 2002.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The records are comprised of briefing books (Governor James S. Gilmore's and his aides) for National Governors' Association Meetings between 1998 and 2001 and the Southern Governors' Association Meeting for 1998. The briefing books contain the meeting agenda and Governor's daily schedule for the meeting. They also may contain handwritten notes, prepared remarks, news clippings and press releases. Also included are several miscellaneous briefing books and reports that were interfiled with this series.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged into the following series:

THE GOVERNOR'S OFFICE GUIDE, 1996 November (part two)

Briefing Book - Annual Meeting, 1998 August 1-4, Milwaukee, Wisconsin (Mark Miner's copy) (part two)

Briefing Books - Winter Meeting, 1999 February 20-23, Washington, D.C. (Mark Miner's copy)

Governor Gilmore's Briefing Book - Winter Meeting, 2001 February 24-27, Washington, D.C. (part two)

II. Southern Governors' Association, 1998.

Virginia Exile, 2000 April
